answers.answer: Hi there. Tingling and numbness in toes needs to be evaluated in detail. It could be due to nerve compression in the back due to degenerated discs or spondylolisthesis, tarsal tunnel syndrome, hypothyroidism, vitamin deficiencies esp. B12 or folate, diabetes mellitus, autoimmune disorders like rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus etc. A detailed examination along with certain tests blood and imaging is required to check the possible causes. Treatment would be according to the cause. Take care.

question: Dear Sir,I feel sensation in my both sole specialy in leg fingers from last five months.Plz. guide me to cure it.
title: sensation in legs
